name: Peak [Demo 3]
description:
Welcome to the 3rd demo of Peak!

In Peak, you can control by clicking or tapping the screen in the direction where you want to point your rockets. This will fire your rockets, blasting you in the opposite direction.

Get to the orb to win!

Keep in mind that this is just a demo so there will be more levels in the future!

Please give me feedback in the comments so that I can make the full version as cool as possible!
